game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the Ruins of Delphi
game.description: The lost artifact of the ancients has been reportedly spotted in the Ruins of Delphi. It is your task to retrieve it safely and bring it back to the Guild.

task.objective: Travel to the Ruins of Delphi
task.description: Make your way safely through the treacherous roads to reach the ruins.
Search throughout the ruins using the map provided by the Guild.
Bring back the artifact to Guildmaster Orion.
